themes: role clarity between city and community organizations
preference for city-led administration and technical assistance
critique of current training and mentorship offerings
key_phrases: outsource any services and programs not related to grant making and the cultural centers
Community organizations are better suited to do this work
administration and technical assistance should be moved back into the City
They are not the right people to be offering fundraising training or mentorship
they are the people to help you fill out the application and process it in a timely manner
barriers_identified: misallocation of responsibilities between city staff and community organizations
inappropriate outsourcing of administration and technical assistance
staff providing training and mentorship instead of application support
solutions_proposed: outsource only non-grantmaking and non-cultural center programs to community organizations
move administration and technical assistance back into the City
limit staff roles to application support and processing
